org.sensorhub.api.persistence

Interface IIndexedStorage


  • public interface IIndexedStorage

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StorageIndexDescriptor addFieldIndex(String fieldPath, StorageIndexDescriptor.IndexType type)
      Adds index of specified type on field identified by the given path The specified field can be scalar or complex but must be compatible with the index type
      List<StorageIndexDescriptor> getAllFieldIndexes()
      Retrieve list of all index added to this storage
      void removeFieldIndex(String indexId)
      Removes the index with the specified ID
